The 'Right' option offers a more equitable distribution (400 for me, 400 for Person A), which aligns more closely with my personal values of fairness and justice. Though it means receiving less money, I believe supporting a more egalitarian outcome is more important given my understanding of the history of inequality and my desire to promote a fairer society, even in a small way.
